org.apache.http.impl.conn.tsccm

类 BasicPooledConnAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.conn.AbstractClientConnAdapter
      • org.apache.http.impl.conn.AbstractPooledConnAdapter
        • org.apache.http.impl.conn.tsccm.BasicPooledConnAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ConnectionReleaseTrigger, HttpRoutedConnection, ManagedClientConnection, ManagedHttpClientConnection, HttpClientConnection, HttpConnection, HttpInetConnection, HttpContext
    已过时。 
    (4.2) do not use

    @Deprecated
public class BasicPooledConnAdapter
extends AbstractPooledConnAdapter
    A connection wrapper and callback handler. All connections given out by the manager are wrappers which can be detached to prevent further use on release.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.http.impl.conn.AbstractPooledConnAdapter

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.http.protocol.HttpContext

        已过时。 
        Creates a new adapter.
        参数:
        tsccm - the connection manager
        entry - the pool entry for the connection being wrapped

      • detach

        protected void detach()
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: AbstractPooledConnAdapter
        Detaches this adapter from the wrapped connection. This adapter becomes useless.
        覆盖:
        detach 在类中 AbstractPooledConnAdapter
